author: PaulHigin
body:
7897853 - Deploying Device Guard with a CI policy renders ServerManager unusable.

The change was checked into razzle rs1_srv branch for GA pick up.  It should eventually FI to the rs1_srv_ps_dev branch where we will merge it to PowerShell repo.  This issue it to track and make sure this happens.  The source depot change list is: 722607.

comments.author: PaulHigin
comments.body: This had already been merged during open sourcing work.

title: Ensure change for GA bug (7897853) is merged to PowerShell repo
